appDescription.message:
Clip Guard AI protects developers from accidentally leaking credentials to AI platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini.

üõ°Ô∏è KEY FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Automatic Secret Detection: Instantly detects 39+ types of secrets including AWS keys, API tokens, private keys, and passwords
‚Ä¢ Real-time Masking: Transforms sensitive data before it reaches AI chatbots
‚Ä¢ Zero Cloud Processing: 100% local detection - no data ever leaves your browser
‚Ä¢ Developer-Focused: Designed specifically for software engineers and DevOps teams

üîë WHAT IT PROTECTS

‚Ä¢ Cloud Provider Keys: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure credentials
‚Ä¢ API Tokens: GitHub, GitLab, NPM, OpenAI, Stripe, Slack, Discord
‚Ä¢ Private Keys: RSA, EC, SSH, PGP keys and certificates
‚Ä¢ Passwords: Environment variables, CLI authentication, database passwords
‚Ä¢ Database Connections: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB URLs
‚Ä¢ Network Information: IP addresses, URLs, API endpoints

‚ö° HOW IT WORKS

1. Install the extension
2. Visit any supported AI platform (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, Grok)
3. Paste code or text containing secrets
4. Secrets are automatically masked before reaching the AI
5. See real-time notifications showing what was protected

‚Ä¢ Claude AI (claude.ai)
‚Ä¢ Google Gemini (gemini.google.com)

‚Ä¢ Grok (grok.com)

üîí PRIVACY & SECURITY

‚Ä¢ 100% Local Processing: All detection happens in your browser
‚Ä¢ No Telemetry: Zero analytics, zero tracking
‚Ä¢ No Data Collection: We never see, store, or transmit your clipboard content
‚Ä¢ Open Source Core: Detection engine transparency
‚Ä¢ Minimal Permissions: Only requires storage for settings

üìä DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE

‚Ä¢ Non-Intrusive: Works silently in the background

‚Ä¢ Statistics: Track how many secrets you've protected

üí° USE CASES

‚Ä¢ Asking AI for code reviews without exposing production credentials

‚Ä¢ Collaborating with AI on infrastructure code securely

Built by developers, for developers. Never leak credentials to AI again.
